amendment.description: An amendment numbered 240 printed in the Congressional Record to strike the section that reduces the fund for the Department of Justice, Community Oriented Policing Service by $290,500,000.

action.text: Amendment (A016) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).
Mr. Wolf raised a point of order against the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A016). Mr. Wolf stated that the amendment seeks to increase net Budget authority. The Chair sustained the point of order.
